Indian Economy.title: Amid Trump tariffs, Australia minister bats for stronger trade deal with India, rare earth supply chain
Indian Economy.summary: At a time when the India-US trade deal is facing challenges, he batted for a stronger trade pact with India, and supported investments by the Adani group in mining in Queensland and Uranium exports to India.

Indian Economy.title: Sudipto Mundle: The best way forward for India’s trade policy amid Trump’s tariffs
Indian Economy.summary: New Delhi mustn’t get provoked into knee-jerk responses and should retain its focus on strategic priorities that’ll outlast the US president. We have greater geopolitical space than many developed countries.

Indian Economy.title: Industrial investment: Demand is at the heart of India’s capex conundrum
Indian Economy.summary: Feeble industrial investment in capacity expansion can be traced to deficient overall demand arising from weak wage earnings, tight household finances and an export slowdown. Demand is the fuel needed; mere sparks of cyclical policy levers won’t suffice. Focu…

Indian Economy.title: Eight years after the ‘Puttaswamy’ privacy verdict, data protection remains a distant dream
Indian Economy.summary: The question is whether India will honour the constitutional mandate or allow industry to kill it through a thousand exemptions

Stock Market.title: Dalal Street slumps as 50% tariff shock triggers broad-based selloff; Realty & IT stocks lead the decline
Stock Market.summary: Among the Sensex firms, Hero Motocorp traded with over 1% gains, Asian Paints, Titan, Bajaj Finance and Adani Enterprises followed with marginal increase

Stock Market.title: Nifty Bank Prediction Today – August 28, 2025: Nifty Bank futures: Index might see a corrective rally
Stock Market.summary: Nifty Bank index opened today’s session lower at 54,256 compared to Tuesday’s close of 54,450. It slipped further after opening and is currently hovering around 54,100, down 0.6 per cent.

Stock Market.title: Rupee rises 6 paise to close at 87.63 against US dollar
Stock Market.summary: Concerns over additional US tariffs on Indian products, which kicked in on Wednesday, and a decline in domestic equity markets capped gains in the local unit

Stock Market.title: Nifty Prediction Today – August 28, 2025: Nifty 50 Futures: Breaks a key support. Go short now and on a rise
Stock Market.summary: Nifty 50 continues to get beaten down. The index has declined further and is currently trading at 24,590, down 0.49 per cent. The advances/declines ratio is at 17:33. This is clearly negative and indicates the danger of seeing more fall.

Startups & Funding.title: Mint Explainer | Funding, infrastructure and support: Making sense of Delhi’s draft startup policy
Startups & Funding.summary: The policy aims to transform the city into a global innovation hub by 2035, targeting the creation of 5,000 startups. With incentives like operational grants and a dedicated venture capital fund, this policy promises to reshape the startup landscape.

Banking & Finance.title: Bank Holiday Today 2025: Why are banks closed in THESE cities on Thursday, August 28? Check city-wise list
Banking & Finance.summary: Nuakhai and Ganesh Chaturthi Bank Holiday in India Today 2025: Banks in India will remain open in all other cities except for the two, with digital services like online banking, ATMs, and mobile banking functioning as usual

Banking & Finance.title: RBI to hold ₹1.5 lakh crore 6-day VRRR auction on Friday
Banking & Finance.summary: Earlier today, the RBI accepted bids amounting to ₹49,515 crore in its one-day VRRR auction, against the notified amount of ₹75,000 crore.

Banking & Finance.title: Rate cuts by RBI ease corporate debt burden, sectoral gains uneven: BoB Report
Banking & Finance.summary: Bank of Baroda report: RBI rate cuts boost company debt serviceability, unevenly impacting industries, with positive outlook for recovery.

Banking & Finance.title: Banks may seek asset classification breather from RBI on their exposure to US exporters
Banking & Finance.summary: Bankers fear that if exporters stop receiving orders from their US clients, their ability to service loans will get severely affected, triggering loan defaults

Banking & Finance.title: Not thuggery—ICICI Bank’s account hike exposes a brewing banking shake-up
Banking & Finance.summary: ICICI Bank’s action on minimum account balance was a response to structural shifts underway in the banking sector. More banks will test, and take, similar paths.
